text: We will hear arguments next in North Haven Board of Education against Bell.
Mr. Chief Justice, may it please the Court, I represent the Trumbull Board of Education.
Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court, may I state first, just briefly, that the interchange, the exchange that occurred is correct.
Mr. Chief Justice, may it please the Court, I represent the private respondent in this case, Linda Potz.
Mr. Chief Justice, I would like to correct several things that were said.
